## R Markdown

#Obtain Alaskan Data
```{r}
library(dataRetrieval)
AlaskaSites<-whatNWISsites(statecode="02")
```


## Bin width
```{r}
(max(AlaskaSites$dec_lat_va)-min(AlaskaSites$dec_lat_va))/10
```

## Assign Bin Width Value to a Variable
```{r}
AlaskaBin<-2.002339
```

## Filter Alaskan Sites by Streams
```{r}
AlaskaStreams<-filter(AlaskaSites, site_tp_cd=="ST")
```

## Check levels
```{r}
levels(AlaskaSites$site_tp_cd)
```
